page.title: 16LOCHGOILHEAD-EDUCATION(2)
page.content: My name is Isla MacFarlane and I'm in Pr.6.I leave home at 08.45,arrive at school at 08.50 in time for starting at 09.00.I walk or cycle to school. Our day begins with a discussion about {World News}followed by{Maths}and {Arithmetic.}After the interval we do {English.}On Tuesday morning the{Piping {Instuctress}comes and on Thursdays we have the{Gym Teacher.}We use the computer a lot;I really enjoy using it and it does help me learn. I stay for school dinners;they are great.Mrs.MacKenzie cooks them in the school kitchen. Afternoons are spent doing our{project and either{Science,Music,Art,History, {Geography,Scots Poetry and Nature {Study. } My favourite subjects are{Piping,Art, {Project,Scots Poetry and Nature Study.
